Detailed Description

MamdaSecStatusHandler is an interface for applications that want to have an easy way to handle security status updates.

The interface defines callback methods for security status events:

MamdaSecStatusListener &  listener,
const MamaMsg &  msg 
) [pure virtual]

Method invoked when a security status update is received.

Parameters:
subscription The subscription which received the update
